name: WEAK POINT ELIMINATION
effect: You cannot be critically hit and are immune to Bonus Damage. Ignore excess damage when you suffer Structure Damage, instead just resetting your HP to full.

synergies.detail: You cannot be critically hit and are immune to Bonus Damage. Ignore excess damage when you suffer Structure Damage, instead just resetting your HP to full.

name: HIGH-TOLERANCE SENSOR FILTERING
effect: You cannot have your line of sight reduced by effects and your attacks only have a 25% chance to miss when affected by Invisibility instead of 50%. 1/Round you can Search, Scan or attempt to detect Mines as a free action.
description: These bleeding edge sensors have been carefully adapted for filtering out of false positives and erroneous data to a degree beyond most others, allowing for superior ability to handle interference.

actions.name: Activate HIGH-TOLERANCE SENSOR FILTERING
actions.detail: 1/Round you can Search, Scan or attempt to detect Mines as a free action.

name: IMPERVIOUS ENGINEERING
effect: You gain +2 Repair Cap and Immunity to any effect that would affect a character in your mech directly.
description: Scirocco Advanced Engineering has gathered a well earned reputation for heavily over engineered safety systems with multiple redundancies for any failing system. Those who have used their designs often swear by them however, as the increase in survival chance for pilots cannot be overstated.

name: DILATION DECAY
effect: 1/Round, when one of your actions forces characters to pass a save or check to reduce or avoid damage, the action deals +1d6 bonus damage.
description: Using small amounts of exotic materials, SAE can modify many devices to cause momentary time dilation around the target. A split-second explosion will leave a foe scorched black; as if they had been held to the flames for several minutes.

synergies.detail: 1/Round, when one of your actions forces characters to pass a save or check to reduce or avoid damage, the action deals +1d6 bonus damage.

name: REENTRY PLATING
effect: Burn does not ignore your Armor. In addition, you have Immunity to Damage, Burn and Heat from environmental sources; including falling.

synergies.detail: Burn does not ignore your Armor. In addition, you have Immunity to Damage, Burn and Heat from environmental sources; including falling.

name: HOT BLOOD
effect: You have Immunity to Stunned that wasn’t caused by one of your own systems, talents, etc. 1/Scene, when you roll an attack, check, save or damage roll and don't like the results you can reroll them.
description: SAE puts intensive work into making sure that their designs have full accessibility options, able to allow any pilot unobstructed access to the machine regardless of any disabilities or injuries. Despite that, perhaps the pilots should be informed that the voice commands work just as well at a whisper as they do at a full shout over open comms.
